alert.note: Alert for Butler; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 5:31PM CDT until May 12 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BUTLER AND WESTERN SAUNDERS COUNTIES... At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Weston, or 11 miles west of Wahoo, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Weston, Prague, Malmo, Bruno, Abie and Czechland Lake. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for east central Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
